title: Advanced Physical Escalation
description: If a girl is giving you these signs of attraction, rest assured you can kiss her right away.
caption: false

channel_info.title: Robbie Kramer
channel_info.description:
I'm Robbie Kramer 🎙Host of The Inner Confidence Podcast & Founder of Inner Confidence, Inc.

I lived an exhilarating single life filled with adventures and lessons, and ultimately achieved what I had always aspired to – finding an amazing, feminine, and loving wife. 

I believe my experiences provide a rare balance of wild freedom and committed love, equipping me with the insights to help you navigate the complexities of dating and relationships in today's world. Let me guide you to embrace your desires, improve your social prowess, and ultimately attract the partner who aligns with your highest aspirations.

You won’t find any fluffy, new-age, or cringy stuff here, just tested, proven and actionable advice that yields results.

Apply to join our exclusive Inner Confidence Community of ambitious men who are actively working together to achieve their goals faster   ► https://innerconfidence.com/community

You can email me at robbie@innerconfidence.com with any questions or comments.

transcription: {"text": "Have you guys heard the finger story? No. Dave was hitting on a girl. I walked up to wing him and he wasn't doing so hot. And the second I walked up, so walk up like you're me, start to talk. Oh this story. I do remember this story now. Yeah. So later on, we're walking through a small corridor, so she was walking towards, she didn't see me because it was crowded. Remember me? And then there's a wall right here, so I went like that and she stayed right there and I said, come here. And then we were like this, and we were talking about dogs and cats. That was the fucking conversation. But we're this close and her boobs were like pressed up against me and we're actually talking this close. And were you touching her as you guys were talking this close? Yeah, I was touching her like this and like this, but that was really it because we're this close. Like you don't need to do a whole lot if you're this close. You don't really need to do much. Right? You're just here and you're talking. And it's just a matter of time. Whenever I end up in a situation like that where I'm really close to a guy, I can't help but get turned on. And if I'm willing to let myself get that close to a guy, then I'm at least halfway attracted to him. And it's like, it like turns on like a sexuality inside me. So I don't think I would ever do the, this move, but she started it and yeah, I got her back. Pretty good. I was proud of myself for that one. Fucking bitch. Give me those views.
